item.title: All in Abyss: Judge the Fake
item.description:
Title: All in Abyss: Judge the Fake
Genre: Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: ACQUIRE Corp. , WSS playground
Publisher: Alliance Arts
Franchise: Alliance Arts
Release Date: Apr 9, 2025




About This Game

…Bet your all, may victory be yours.

In this game, you adventure to become a successful gambler by challenging others at the game of Texas Hold‘em Poker.

Use various skills to achieve victory in poker, expose the hands of the witches, All-in to steal their winnings, and become the ruler of the gambling district.

ーーーーー

Poker Battles

An "anything goes" Texas Hold'em style 1v1 poker-like card game.
Become victorious by reducing the enemy chips to 0.



  • ACTIVATE SKILLS
The “gambling prodigy” Asuha is capable of turning the tides of battle using various skills, sourcing from her aptitude in gambling.
Limit the opponent’s play, gain insight beyond their hand, and much more… stay victorious with skills that expand the pool of decision-making.




  • ALL-IN
“All-In” is a command that puts all chips on the table and your life as a gambler on the line.
Use various means to put yourself in a favorable position, and use this command to slam the final nail in the coffin.

Showdown vs The Witches

A “Witch” is a Boss Character present in each chapter of the game.
All Witches excel at poker, but with enough preparation, the player can expose the Witches’ fraudulent acts and sink them to the depths of hell with a deadly All-In.




  • THE CITY
The scene is set in The City, where various information can be gathered.
Find sources to help unveil the secrets behind the Witches’ cheats and frauds to achieve sweet vengeance.
Additionally, you can hustle the gamblers around town to rake in quick cash, or go on a winning streak in “Poker Royale”—which rewards you after achieving a set number of victories—to earn the points needed for acquiring new skills and to obtain rare items, thereby increasing your standing as a gambler.


The only appropriate sequel to cashing out, is to spend big.
Your earnings can be spent deservingly at "club ALL OUT" to party your heart out.
Should you catch lady luck's eye, you will be treated to bonus luck for your next battle.


  • EXPOSE THE WITCHES’ HAND
Your finesse in poker may earn you some cash in The City, but the Witches - who rule the districts, will not allow for a fair victory. Their methods of cheating seems to be fool-proof, but the evidence you uncover will say otherwise.
Explore every inch of the city and expose the cheaters of their tricks.

STORY

Asuha Senahara, a self-proclaimed genius gambler, is a wanderer.
Amidst the tables of cards and dice, it is she alone who snatches the chips at stake.
One day, she learns of the gambling district “the city”, a special ward where gambling holds influence above all else.
In this city run by the strongest gamblers known as the “Witches”, Asuha experiences the first defeat in her life.
They exercised not luck, not skill, but dirty tricks, such that felled Asuha to the depths of the abyss.
As a self-proclaimed genius gambler, Asuha becomes determined to take down the Witches.
The Coliseum is the battlefield. The challenger is Asuha Senahara. The chips are on the table, and the Witches are ready to be exposed.

Characters

  • Asuha Senahara
Self-proclaimed genius gambler. A failure of a human being, but has a strong resolve and is determined when it comes to gambling. A pretty young lady on the cover, a middle-aged old man on the inside.



  • Mina Nosaka
A girl who saved Asuha after her defeat against the witch.



  • Ulu Amamino
The First Witch. Uses her mysterious powers to easily defeat Asuha.
Loves snacks and sweets.



  • Yuragi Tenraku
The Second Witch. Full of maternal warmth, yet subtly tinged with madness.



  • Lancille Kareido
The Third Witch. A lively and outgoing personality, embodying the ultimate "gal" vibe.
Serves as the warden of a forced labor facility.

Credits

Planning & Development ACQUIRE (developers of “Octopath Traveler”)
Scenario Shusei Sakagami (Scenario of “Heaven Burns Red”)
Art/b] 藤田川晴昭
BGM Feryquitous
Production WSS Playground (Planning & Production of “NEEDY STREAMER OVERLOAD”)



AI Generated Content Disclosure

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:

Background images in this game partially contains AI generated content that is post-processed by hand and given final touches to best suit the game's thematics. "The City" does not conform to this, and is created from the ground up by the fine hands of the creators and artists.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 or later
    • Processor: Core i5-10300K
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1500 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10 or later
    • Processor: Core i5-10600K
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1500 MB available space

item.title: Asgard's Fall — Viking Survivors
item.description:
Title: Asgard's Fall — Viking Survivors
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , Indie , RPG , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: Soulpotion
Publisher: Assemble Entertainment , INSTINCT3
Franchise: Assemble Entertainment
Release Date: Apr 9, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Apr 9, 2025




About This Game

Embark on an epic saga in Asgard's Fall, a norse Survivors-like Roguelite. Fight your way through hordes of creatures and let the gods feel your relentless wrath. How will your saga unfold?

You can choose from a variety of heroes to demonstrate your might in the battle against Asgard, such as the fierce Warrior and the agile Huntress, each with their own distinct skill tree. Do you have the courage to face the hordes and leaders of the Nine Realms?

Master the art of combat with the dynamic Ability System. Choose from a diverse array of skills, each tailored to your playstyle. Unleash devastating attacks, strategic buffs, and unique powers to conquer the Nine Realms. Forge your hero's destiny!

Behold the Web of Wyrd, where the threads of destiny are woven by your own hand. Forge your fate by placing powerful knots into the Web of Wyrd, further enhancing your strength on your path to conquering Asgard.

A meta-progression system where you unlock Warpaint runes that modify and amplify your characters' abilities. It features an inventory management system, challenging you to fit as many effective runes as possible into a limited space, maximizing their impact on your abilities, playstyle, and strategy.

Warpaint runes can be found during battle or crafted using pigments looted from enemies or discovered in Yggdrasil's Gift caches.

Shape your hero's evolution with our intricate Skill Tree. Customize your playstyle by unlocking diverse abilities, enhancing strengths, and adapting to challenges. Every choice influences your saga's outcome. Craft a hero uniquely suited to your journey through the Nine Realms!
Asgard’s Fall takes streaming to the next level with interactive Twitch extension, letting viewers directly influence the action. Through real-time polls, your audience can bless you with powerful boons or challenge you with devastating twists—turning every run into an unpredictable adventure. No two playthroughs are ever the same!

item.title: Gedonia 2
item.description:
Title: Gedonia 2
Genre: RPG , Early Access
Developer: Kazakov Oleg
Publisher: Kazakov Oleg
Franchise: Gedonia
Release Date: Apr 9, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Apr 9, 2025




About This Game

Cooperative Multiplayer: Dive into the vast and immersive world of Gedonia with friends like never before! Introducing a cooperative multiplayer feature that supports up to 4 players, embark on a journey either solo or with a team. Whether you want to brave the challenges alone or share the experience with friends, the choice is yours. Every quest, every challenge, and every corner of the world is accessible and completable in both single-player and multiplayer modes.



Advanced Character Building: Discover a deepened and more intricate character building system, allowing players to craft and customize hundreds of unique builds. Experiment with different abilities, attributes, and playstyles to forge your own distinct hero or villain. Your character, your rules!



A Truly Dynamic Open World: Gedonia's world isn't just vast; it's alive. Roam the expansive landscapes freely, unveiling hidden mysteries, confronting formidable enemies, deciphering puzzles, and unearthing treasured rewards. With a world as dynamic as Gedonia, every exploration becomes an unforgettable tale.




Consequential Actions: In Gedonia 2, every action echoes in the universe. Make choices that not only define your character's path but also mold and transform the world around you. Experience the ripple effects of your decisions, both immediate and long-term, as they lead to surprising and often drastic consequences.

Enhanced Crafting System: Crafting takes a leap forward in Gedonia 2! With a more intuitive and expansive crafting interface, create powerful weapons, intricate armors, and useful items that can aid you in your adventures. The world offers raw materials in abundance; it's up to you to harness their potential.

Engaging, Hand-Crafted Quests: Dive into meticulously designed quests, each carrying its own narrative weight, challenges, and decisions. Influence the outcomes of these quests through your choices, be it through strategic decision-making or skill-check dialogue options. Every path offers a unique story, and it's your choices that pen the narrative.

Join us in Gedonia 2, where adventure awaits at every turn, and where your story is yet to be written. Dive in, and let's write it together.

item.title: Burden of Command™
item.description:
Title: Burden of Command™
Genre: Indie , RPG , Strategy
Developer: Green Tree Games LLC
Publisher: Green Tree Games LLC
Release Date: Apr 8, 2025




About This Game




Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Contains infrequent historical photographs of graphic violence and disease to better illuminate the brutality of war. Not suitable for children. One section is exceptionally severe and contains sustained graphic imagery. An option is given to skip, though this is not encouraged. Mature topics such as PTSD ("Combat Fatigue") and sexual disease are covered. Language can be strong.
The intent is to help convey the realities of WWII and of war.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10+
    • Processor: 2 GHz
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1200x800 (1920x1080 or more recommended)
    • Storage: 18 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Some integrated Intel HD graphics cards have been known to work but are not officially supported.

item.title: Age of Empires IV: Knights of Cross and Rose
item.description:
Title: Age of Empires IV: Knights of Cross and Rose
Genre: Strategy
Developer: Forgotten Empires , Climax Studios , Relic Entertainment , World's Edge
Publisher: Xbox Game Studios
Franchise: Age of Empires
Release Date: Apr 8, 2025




About This Content

Embark on an epic journey with Age of Empires IV: Knights of Cross and Rose, the newest DLC that puts you in command of two well-known armies inspired by history. Whether you’re a seasoned strategist or new to the series, this DLC delivers rich, historically inspired content that can be enjoyed across a variety of modes.

Featuring variant civilizations that expand upon the concept, this DLC introduces the Knights Templar and House of Lancaster, which innovate upon the French and English. These armies bring with them a war chest full of unique units, game mechanics, and strategies. Command the indomitable Knights Templar with their valorous crusaders and blend of European military traditions that offer a wide range of possible strengths. Marshal the resolute forces of the House of Lancaster, steeped in the turmoil of The War of the Roses and possessing unparalleled ranged tactics; the House of Lancaster utilizes their thriving economy to acquire technological advantages little known in Europe at the time. Both variant civilizations offer engaging new combat opportunities, ensuring every match is a clash of wits and courage alike.

Live the legacy of these iconic armies in the new action-packed game mode: Historical Battles. Rally the Knights Templar and House of Lancaster in missions inspired by iconic historic confrontations. Lead the Knights Templar in the Battle of Montgisard as they stave off Saladin’s forces. Ensure the House of Lancaster’s survival against the Yorkists after a calamitous defeat at Towton.

Designed to give you a glimpse into pivotal moments in history, these four missions offer the opportunity to challenge your skills in repeat plays as you try new strategies and earn medals. Each mission includes an optional Conqueror Mode for the especially brave of heart.

What's more, this DLC enriches your skirmish and multiplayer encounters with 10 new maps. Navigate diverse terrains that range from lush countrysides to treacherous battlegrounds, each demanding tailored strategies and keen insight. Whether you're skirting the flanks in a multiplayer clash or plotting a singleplayer siege on hallowed historical grounds, these maps ensure there's always a fresh field to test your mettle.

With this new content, Knights of Cross and Rose, is set to captivate both new and returning players alike. The Historical Battles offer concentrated yet intense challenges for those who prefer solo play that emphasizes adept strategy, while the Knights Templar and House of Lancaster expand further upon the unique elements of variant civilizations. Expect an immersive experience with these compelling additions to the beloved Age of Empires IV universe—a true testament to the franchise's continual growth and innovation.

Secure your journey into the heart of medieval conflict, where legends are forged, and empires rise from the crucible of battle. Build massive armies. Command your troops. Claim your place in history with Age of Empires IV: Knights of Cross and Rose.
